response.overview: BentFilms is back. The sophmore project in the Bentfilms saga was in production for 2 years, to ensure the highest quality skiboarding that North America and the world has to Ben Wannamaker | White Dwarfoffer. After 2 years of extensive touring to Japan, Utah, Jersery, Ontario, Quebec, Pennsylvania, British Columbia and handrails all along the way, BentFilms now presents, White Dwarf. Featuring only the freshest talent on the skiboard scene, White Dwarf is highlighting the talents of Bailey Mitchell, Kevin Boate, Neal Lyons, Brian Class, Adam Lynam, Andy Stewart, Ben Wannamaker, Ethan Mitchell, Kirk Thompson, Alex Beaudet, Billy Doucet, Jon White and More. All the chaos, commotion and carnage was caught on super 8 and three chip digital video. Featuring loads of bonus footage of behinds the scenes action and sections that almost made the cut! With a new and vibrant soundtrack featuring artists from around the globe, the vibe of White Dwarf is incompareable. Enjoy the ride
response.title: White Dwarf
